diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Art Therapy.

flowchart TD
    ArtTherapy[Art Therapy] --> Field1[Art]
    ArtTherapy --> Field2[Medicine]
    ArtTherapy --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    art --> artSub1[Theory]
    art --> artSub2[Practice]
    medicine --> medicineSub1[Theory]
    medicine --> medicineSub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
